Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.tableReleted

Class GameParty

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.tableReleted.GameParty
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameParty extends Object implements Serializable
This class is used to manage the players in the game
See Also:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameParty(List<String> playerNames)
    The constructor of the class playerList is shuffled to create a random order of the players all players are considered inactive at the creation of the gameParty

      public GameParty(List<String> playerNames)
      The constructor of the class playerList is shuffled to create a random order of the players all players are considered inactive at the creation of the gameParty
      Parameters:
      playerNames - list of all players nicks' who can join this game

    • getPlayerFromNick

      public Player getPlayerFromNick(String nickname)
      This method is used to get the user from its nickname if the user is not in the gameParty, it returns null
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the user
      Returns:
      the user with the given nickname; returns null if the user is not in the gameParty
